titleStmt.title: News from the Lowe-Countreys or Podex his encomium. Held out for publick information. By Mercurius Lepidus.
titleStmt.author: Lepidus, Mercurius.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffeb. 20."; 2 in imprint date crossed through and a "1" written along side.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
